sections.name: Section A - Multiple Choice Questions
instructions: Attempt all the Questions of this Section
Do not copy down the part questions. Write only the answer against the proper number of the Question and its part according to the question Paper

questions.question: The 3N zygote in angiosperm develop into:
The muscle which is responsible to straighten the limb:
The genetic constitution of a trait is called:
Respiratory surface processes following properties:
Removal of extra liquid water is:
The chemical material of a chromosome is called:
The cold war between the organisms of a community occupying the same habitat is called:
The biological function which perform gaseous exchange:
Stimulus is detected by:
Drugs that slow normal brain functioning are categorized as:
The shortest path of reflex action consists of:
Most the living things use Oxygen to produce:

sections.name: Section B - Short Answer Questions
instructions: Answer any EIGHT questions from this section

questions.question: Define the following: (i) Filtration (ii) Binary Fission (iii) Evolution
Write three causes of variation.
Write three differences between chemical and nervous co-ordination.
Define excretion in animals. Name the excretory organ of any three animals.
Draw a neat and labelled diagram of human eye.
What are addictive drugs? Write any three names.
Write down any three uses of fermentation.
Write down three methods to control air pollution.
Write down three functions of skeleton.
Write down three uses of genetic engineering.
Draw a neat and labelled diagram of ovule.
Describe briefly the structure of DNA.

sections.name: Section C - Detailed Answer Questions
instructions: Attempt any FOUR questions from this Section

questions.question: Draw a neat and labelled diagram of respiratory system of human.
Define ecosystem. Describe its biotic components and their types.
Define pollution and its types. Write down importance of pollution.
Define endocrine system. Write down name of three endocrine glands with one secretion of each.
Write down names of disorders of kidney. Explain any two from them.
Describe types of asexual reproduction in animals.
